Posts.Title: A rad onc weighs in on radiation "burns" Spinnerpom 53nancy

Posts.Content: LindseyLadd wrote: I was just diagnosed a few weeks ago with stage 1, grade 3 breast cancer and I'm 28. I'm feeling very lost because I haven't met anyone else my age with any experience with breast cancer. I'm extremely anxious, so I was hoping there are others out there in my similar position? Thank you! Dx 11/25/2013, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 12/4/2013 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Radiation Therapy 2/24/2014 Breast Hormonal Therapy 4/10/2014 Log in to post a reply
